p: Meteorological data were collected from the Jilin Provincial Climate Center ( http://www.jlqx.gov.cn/). The climate factors included monthly mean temperature (MT), monthly mean maximum temperature (MaxT), monthly mean minimum temperature (MinT), monthly mean relative humidity (RH), monthly accumulative precipitation (AP), monthly mean wind velocity (MWV), and monthly sunshine duration (SD). Measurements of these parameters were taken daily, and then monthly mean value was calculated.
